definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Get the south and north side gangs to kill each other so someone else can take over.
sentences.chinese: 讓南北兩邊的人殺個兩敗俱傷然後某個人坐收漁利。

sentences.english: You can hunker down and take it.
sentences.chinese: 你完全可以繼續跟進，坐收漁利。

sentences.english: Hence, strategically, India can let US/Japan to confront China in SCS.
sentences.chinese: 因此，戰略上，讓美日對抗中國印度坐收漁利。
